question: Based on the provided evidence, answer the following question: Who was Kevin King's employer after 2036?. If the evidence is insufficient to answer the question, return 'INSUFFICIENT_INFORMATION'.

content.source_1:
Title: The Trail of Evidence: Uncovering Kevin King's Tenure at the University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio

In the heart of Texas, where the vibrant city of San Antonio meets the rolling hills of the Hill Country, lies a prestigious institution renowned for its excellence in healthcare and research. The University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio, a beacon of medical innovation, has been home to some of the brightest minds in the field. Among them is Kevin King, a researcher whose work has left an indelible mark on the scientific community. As we delve into the life and career of Kevin King, a fascinating narrative unfolds, weaving together threads of evidence that unequivocally support the claim: Kevin King worked for the University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio. Our journey begins with a crucial piece of evidence: Kevin King's ORCID (Open Researcher and Contributor ID), a unique identifier assigned to researchers to distinguish them from others with similar names. King's ORCID, 0000-0002-7169-7891, serves as a digital fingerprint, linking him to his publications, affiliations, and research endeavors. A simple search of this identifier reveals a treasure trove of information, including his association with the University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio. One of King's most notable research projects, published in a prestigious scientific journal, lists him as an affiliate of the University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio. The article, a groundbreaking study on the applications of machine learning in healthcare, features King as a co-author, alongside other prominent researchers from the institution. This collaboration is a testament to King's involvement with the university, as he worked alongside esteemed colleagues to advance the field of medical research. Further investigation reveals that King's research profile on the university's website features a comprehensive list of his publications, presentations, and awards. This profile, maintained by the university's administration, serves as a digital résumé, showcasing King's accomplishments and expertise. The presence of this profile is a clear indication of his affiliation with the institution, as it is only accessible to faculty members and researchers affiliated with the university. In addition to his research profile, King's name appears in various university publications, including the institution's newsletter and annual reports. These documents, available in the university's archives, provide a historical record of King's involvement with the institution, highlighting his contributions to the scientific community and his role in advancing the university's mission.
content.source_2: In the sweltering summer of 2034, Dr. Kevin King stepped off the high-speed train at Málaga's sleek, modern station, his eyes scanning the unfamiliar landscape. The warm Mediterranean air enveloped him as he made his way to the University of Málaga, his new employer for the next two years. The prestigious institution had lured him away from his previous post with promises of cutting-edge research facilities and a talented team of colleagues. As he settled into his new role, Kevin threw himself into his work, driven by a passion for innovation and discovery. The university's state-of-the-art labs became his second home, where he spent long hours collaborating with his team to push the boundaries of their field. The days blended together in a blur of experiments, data analysis, and brainstorming sessions, but Kevin thrived in the fast-paced environment. The months flew by, marked by milestones and breakthroughs. Kevin's research began to gain international attention, and he found himself in high demand as a speaker at conferences and symposia. His name became synonymous with excellence in his field, and the University of Málaga basked in the reflected glory of his achievements. As 2035 drew to a close, Kevin's team made a groundbreaking discovery, one that would change the course of their research forever. The excitement was palpable as they worked tirelessly to refine their findings, and Kevin's leadership inspired his team to strive for even greater heights. But as the calendar flipped to 2036, Kevin knew that his time at the University of Málaga was drawing to a close. He had accomplished everything he had set out to do, and more. The university had provided him with the perfect platform to showcase his talents, and he was grateful for the opportunity. As he packed up his office and said goodbye to his colleagues, Kevin felt a sense of nostalgia wash over him. He had grown to love the vibrant city of Málaga, with its rich history and warm, welcoming people. But he knew that it was time to move on, to take on new challenges and explore new frontiers. With a sense of excitement and anticipation, Kevin King boarded the train once more, bound for his next adventure. The University of Málaga would always hold a special place in his heart, a reminder of the incredible work he had accomplished during his two-year tenure.
